dt: {bc}a platform in a ship serving usually as a structural element and forming the floor for its compartments
{bc}something resembling the deck of a ship: such as
{bc}a story or tier of a building (such as a sports stadium)
{bc}a flat floored roofless area adjoining a house
{bc}the lid of the compartment at the rear of the body of an automobile
{bc}a collection of visual or photographic slides presented usually one after another as a slideshow

dt.t: Pompliano was on the job for a mere three weeks in 2015, but in that time he prepared a PowerPoint {wi}deck{/wi} laying out what he believed were the key inaccuracies in the company's numbers.
Accompanying a talk with images is standard professional practice, but a poorly organized or dense slide {wi}deck{/wi} can spoil a presentation.

et: Middle English {it}dekke{/it} covering of a ship, from Middle Dutch {it}*dec{/it} covering, probably from Middle Low German {it}vordeck{/it}, from {it}vordecken{/it} to cover, from {it}vor-{/it} for- + {it}decken{/it} to cover; akin to Old High German {it}decchen{/it} to cover {ma}{mat|thatch|}{/ma}
shortdef: a platform in a ship serving usually as a structural element and forming the floor for its compartments
something resembling the deck of a ship: such as
a story or tier of a building (such as a sports stadium)

dt: {bc}to clothe in a striking or elegant manner {bc}{sx|array||}

dt.t: {wi}deck{/wi} the halls with boughs of holly

dt: {bc}to furnish with or as if with a deck

pt: {sc}adorn{/sc} {sc}decorate{/sc} {sc}ornament{/sc} {sc}embellish{/sc} {sc}beautify{/sc} {sc}deck{/sc} {sc}garnish{/sc} mean to enhance the appearance of something by adding something unessential. {sc}adorn{/sc} implies an enhancing by something beautiful in itself.
{sc}decorate{/sc} suggests relieving plainness or monotony by adding beauty of color or design.
{sc}ornament{/sc} and {sc}embellish{/sc} imply the adding of something extraneous, {sc}ornament{/sc} stressing the heightening or setting off of the original

pt.t: a white house {it}ornamented{/it} with green shutters

pt: , {sc}embellish{/sc} often stressing the adding of superfluous or adventitious ornament.
{sc}beautify{/sc} adds to {sc}embellish{/sc} a suggestion of counterbalancing plainness or ugliness.

pt.t: will {it}beautify{/it} the grounds with flower beds

pt: {sc}deck{/sc} implies the addition of something that contributes to gaiety, splendor, or showiness.

pt.t: a house all {it}decked{/it} out for Christmas

pt: {sc}garnish{/sc} suggests decorating with a small final touch and is used especially in referring to the serving of food.

et: Dutch {it}dekken{/it} to cover; akin to Old High German {it}decchen{/it}
shortdef: to clothe in a striking or elegant manner : array

dt.t: {wi}clear{/wi} my mind about the new arrangement

dt: {bc}to free from what obstructs or is unneeded: such as
{bc}to remove unwanted growth or items from
{bc}to rid or make a rasping noise as if ridding (the throat) of phlegm
{bc}to erase stored or displayed data from (a device, such as a computer or calculator)
{bc}to remove from an area or place
{bc}to permit (an aircraft) to proceed usually with a specified action
{bc}to free (a ship or shipment) by payment of duties or harbor fees
{bc}to go over, under, or by without touching

dt.t: it {wi}cleared{/wi} up quickly after the rain

dt: {bc}to conform to regulations or pay requisite fees prior to leaving port

dt.t: The ship {wi}cleared{/wi} yesterday and is ready to sail.

dt: {bc}to go to an authority (as for approval) before becoming effective

dt.t: All tax bills must {wi}clear{/wi} through our committee.

dt: {bc}to remove elements of hostility, tension, confusion, or uncertainty

dt.t: had a long meeting to {it}clear the air{/it}

shortdef: to free from pollution or cloudiness
to free from accusation or blame : exonerate, vindicate

dt: {bc}the uppermost complete deck of an aircraft carrier

shortdef: the uppermost complete deck of an aircraft carrier
the forward compartment in some airplanes

dt: {bc}the lowest deck in a ship having four or more decks

et: Middle English {it}overlop{/it} deck of a single decker, from Middle Low German {it}overlōp{/it}, literally, something that overleaps
shortdef: the lowest deck in a ship having four or more decks

dt: {bc}a partial deck above a ship's main afterdeck

shortdef: a partial deck above a ship's main afterdeck

dt: {bc}an upper deck or an area on a deck of a passenger ship where passengers stroll

shortdef: an upper deck or an area on a deck of a passenger ship where passengers stroll

dt: {bc}a device used to play back and often to record on magnetic tape that usually has to be connected to an audio system

shortdef: a device used to play back and often to record on magnetic tape that usually has to be connected to an audio system

dt: {bc}a deck having no overhead protection from the weather

shortdef: a deck having no overhead protection from the weather

dt: {bc}a space on the weather deck of a ship lying at a lower level between a raised forecastle or poop and the bridge superstructure

shortdef: a space on the weather deck of a ship lying at a lower level between a raised forecastle or poop and the bridge superstructure
